participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, always looking for ways to express herself through crafts and baking.
participant_1.background: knitting is my passion. i love to bake cookies. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i have a dogs. i am scared of dying.

participant_2.name: Li Wei
participant_2.personality: Energetic and fun-loving, enjoys engaging in sports and sharing treats with friends.
participant_2.background: i speak chinese. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong. i love chocolate bars.
